alert.note: Alert for Adair; Audubon; Cass; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:21AM CDT until July 17 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Southwestern Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Southeastern Audubon County in west central Iowa... Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 520 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Exira, or 13 miles southeast of Audubon, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Anita, Exira, Adair, Fontanelle, Casey, Massena, Bridgewater, Brayton, Wiota, Lake Anita State Park, Greenfield Municipal Airport, Nodaway Park and Anita Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 61 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
